name: Sanson, Nicolas (1600-1667 )
subject: North America -- Maps -- Early works to 1800
note: "PresentÃ©e a Monseigneur le Davphin, parson tres-humble, tres-obeissant, et tres fidele seruiteur, Hubert Iaillot."
"Avec privilege du Roy pour vingt ans."
Probably from: Atlas nouveau, contenant toutes les parties du monde / Sr. Sanson. [Paris] : Jaillot, 1692-1696.
par le S. Sanson, geographe ordinaire du Roy.

solr_doc_hash.mms_name: Charles Dickens collection of papers, [1833]-[1975] bulk ([1833]-1909).
title: Charles Dickens collection of papers, [1833]-[1975] bulk ([1833]-1909).
title_sort: Charles Dickens collection of papers, [1833]-[1975] bulk ([1833]-1909).
name: Dickens, Charles (1812-1870)
subject: Dickens, Charles, 1812-1870
note: Charles Dickens was a British novelist, short story writer,essayist and journalist.
Creation of collection-level record funded with the generous support of the Gladys Kreible Delmas Foundation.

This is a synthetic collection consisting of manuscripts, typescripts, correspondence, diaires for 1867 and 1868, notebooks for 1843 through 1870, financial and legal documents, portraits and pictorial works.
